about_the_game:
You better watch out, you better not shout, you better not laugh at Ragnagord's snout... Krampus is a Legendary monster which delivers nefarious magic gifts to your foes. Add the Epic bashing power of the wildfolk and the eerie melody of magic bells to get slaying all season long. Don't forget to bring your Snowman Pet with you! With this bundle, you'll receive enough copies of Ragnagord to ascend it to Legendary level, as well as a heap of Souls, Ingots and Keys.

This Bundle is great for new-to-intermediate players who want to add devastating magic debuff and attack powers to their teams.

CONTENTS:
  • Legendary Troop - Krampus
  • 6 Epic Troop - Ragnagord
  • Legendary Weapon - Slay Bells
  • Pet - Snowball, the Snowman bear
  • 10 Legendary Ingots
  • 12,000 Souls
  • 5 Event Keys

BECOME A VIP AND GET PERKS
This purchase will earn you permanent VIP Points which will help you unlock VIP Levels. Higher VIP Levels come with increasingly large bonuses to Gem purchases, rewards, daily login bonuses, and some unique extras.
